title: Executive Order 5657-Amending Schedule A of the Civil-Service Rules
content: Schedule A of the civil-service rules, Subdivision II-State Department, paragraph 2, is hereby amended to read:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5657-Amending Schedule A of the Civil-Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361250
